channel.title: Enable user Namespace concern
channel.description: I want to run `podman` containers rootlessly. It requires enable `user.max_user_namespace`. If I change the value to `user.max_user_namespac=15000` how does that effect security?

item.title: Enable user Namespace concern
item.dc:creator: SteveK1978
item.description:
I want to run podman containers rootlessly. It requires enable user.max_user_namespace. If I change the value to user.max_user_namespac=15000 how does that effect security?
